title: Experimental font
content:
I would like it if designers out there could download this typeface I created from a web page and experiment with it. (Its my first go at a typeface)   
   
 [http://www.breadlegs.com/loaders/experimental/sir\_khular.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018091831/http:/www.breadlegs.com/loaders/experimental/sir_khular.html)
author: anonymous

comments.content: nice and creative. I'm going to give it a shot with a wallpaper and see what I can come up with....arterie ( [http://arterie.deviantart.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018091831/http:/arterie.deviantart.com/) )
